channel.title: I need help changing hp on [pi]
channel.description:
ok so... i went to source/data/cfg/npc.cfg and changed the hp of the monster that i wanted different hp on, saved. I compiled and ran the server but when i spawn the monster and attack it it still has the same amount of hp as before i changed it... am i supposed to change it in a different spot on the source? ive looked everywhere please helpp!!!
(I also tried source/bin/cfg/npc.cfg however when i go to compile i get an error saying [code]javac: file not found: *.java usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . . _[/code]

item.title: I need help changing hp on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @pure_mages_r pure mages r
item.description:
@pure_mages_r wrote:

i can help you do WHATEVER you want. all i want in exchange is a rs sms pin (:

Read full topic
